name: product_promotion_v2
description: Product promotion variant with details | USE: promote product, product details, product information, product specs, specification highlights | NOT: new product launch, introducing product, service, app

samples.title: GRILLED CHICKEN
samples.description: Description of the chicken dish and its ingredients

fieldPrompt.brand: Enter the top-right brand name (e.g., 'Dolze AI')
fieldPrompt.title: Enter the main title (max 60 characters)
fieldPrompt.description: Enter the description text (optional, max 200 characters)
fieldPrompt.contact_text: Enter the contact prefix text (e.g., 'Contact us on')
fieldPrompt.address_line1: Enter the first line of the address
fieldPrompt.address_line2: Enter the second line of the address
fieldPrompt.product_image_url: Enter URL for the product image
fieldPrompt.background_color: Enter background color (hex or css color, e.g., '#ff9800' for orange)
fieldPrompt.price_bg_color: Enter price bubble background color (hex or css color)
fieldPrompt.price_text_color: Enter price bubble text color (hex or css color)
fieldPrompt.text_color: Enter text color for brand, title, description, contact, and address (hex or css color)
fieldPrompt.custom_css: Optional: Enter custom CSS to override/extend default styles
fieldPrompt.custom_html: Optional: Enter custom HTML to replace the default template structure

components.html_content:
${brand}
${title}
${description}
${price}
${contact_text}
${contact_phone}
${address_line1}
${address_line2}
${custom_html}
